item.title: Acne Scar Revision
item.author: drvishal@kalpanaaesthetics.com (Kalpana Aesthetics)
item.description: Acne Scar Revision in Jaipur Dr Vishal Purohit, the renowned plastic surgeon, is making waves in the medical world with his revolutionary Acne Scar Revision treatment. This innovative procedure is designed to reduce the appearance of acne scars, giving patients a smoother, more even complexion. The treatment works by using a combination of laser resurfacing, dermabrasion, and fillers to reduce the appearance of acne scars. Laser resurfacing works by using a laser to remove the top layer of skin, while dermabrasion is a process of sanding down the skin to reduce the appearance of scarring.
